text: Bezdek may refer to: ; People * András Bezdek, a Hungarian-American mathematician specializing in discrete geometry * Hugo Bezdek, a Czech- American sports figure * Károly Bezdek, a professor of mathematics at the University of Calgary * Pavel Bezdek, a Czech actor and stunt performer * Rudolf Bezděk, a Czech boxer who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. ; Other * 23199 Bezdek a main belt asteroid
title: Bezdek
